name: Jugendherberge Stuttgart International
description: Youth hostel in the heart of Stuttgart. Dorms from 25€/night. Free WiFi, breakfast included.

name: Alex 30 Hostel
description: Modern hostel near city center. Private rooms from 35€. Great atmosphere for travelers.

name: A&O Stuttgart City
description: Budget hotel chain. Clean rooms starting at 39€. Perfect for short stays.

name: Ibis Budget Stuttgart City Nord
description: No-frills hotel with essential comfort. Rooms from 42€. Near public transport.

name: B&B Hotel Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt
description: Simple and affordable. Double rooms from 49€. Free parking available.

name: Motel One Stuttgart
description: Design budget hotel. Rooms from 79€/night with great city views.

name: Der Zauberlehrling
description: Boutique design hotel. Each room uniquely themed. Award-winning architecture.

name: Le Méridien Stuttgart
description: 5-star luxury in the city center. Rooftop bar with panoramic views. Spa & wellness.

name: Steigenberger Graf Zeppelin
description: Historic grand hotel since 1931. Elegant rooms, Michelin restaurant, prime location.

name: Waldhotel Stuttgart
description: Tranquil forest retreat with city views. Gourmet dining, infinity pool, tennis courts.

name: Althoff Hotel am Schlossgarten
description: Elegant 5-star overlooking Schlossgarten park. Michelin-starred restaurant, spa.

name: Vatan Döner
description: Best döner in Stuttgart according to locals. Huge portions, authentic taste.

name: Memo's Kebab Haus
description: Family-run kebab shop. Try their special sauce! Open until 3am.

name: Istanbul Grill
description: Turkish restaurant with amazing kebab platters. Great for groups.

name: Weinstube Fröhlich
description: Traditional Swabian cuisine. Try the Maultaschen! Cozy atmosphere.

name: Cafe Königsbau
description: Historic café with excellent cakes and coffee. Perfect for breakfast.

name: Bitcoin Stammtisch Stuttgart
description: Monthly Bitcoin meetup. Discuss crypto, network with enthusiasts. Every first Thursday.

name: Ethereum Developer Meetup
description: Weekly coding sessions for Ethereum devs. Beginners welcome!

name: Stuttgart Jazz Open
description: Annual jazz festival in July. World-class musicians, outdoor stages.

name: Musikschule Stuttgart
description: Learn any instrument! Guitar, piano, drums. Trial lessons available.

name: Rockshop Music Academy
description: Rock and pop music school. Band workshops and solo lessons.

name: Sky Beach Stuttgart
description: Rooftop bar with city views. Great cocktails, chill vibes.

name: Climax Institutes
description: Underground techno club. Best sound system in the city.

name: Coworking0711
description: Modern coworking space. Day passes 15€, monthly from 150€.

name: Stadtbibliothek Stuttgart
description: Stunning modern library. Free entry, free WiFi, quiet study areas.
